LanguageSelection.title: Choose Document Language
LanguageSelection.subtitle: Select the language for your CV and cover letter
LanguageSelection.aiGenerationNote: AI-generated content will be written in your selected language.
LanguageSelection.websiteLanguageNote: This does not change the website language. Use the globe icon in the header to switch the site language.

Hero.title: Create professional documents online. Fast, easy, and print-ready.
Hero.subtitle: CVs, agreements, and documents fill the form, pay online, and download instantly or print in our office.

HowItWorks.title: How It Works
HowItWorks.step1Desc: Select from our wide range of document services.
HowItWorks.step2Desc: Enter your details in our easy-to-use forms.
HowItWorks.step4Desc: Get your file instantly or pick it up.

Preview.title: What you see is what you print.

Payment.text: Pay online safely. No hidden fees.

Footer.brandDesc: Professional document services for everyone. Fast, reliable, and secure.

ServicesPage.title: Choose Your Service
ServicesPage.description: Select the service that best fits your needs. We help you create professional documents that stand out.
ServicesPage.resumeDescription: Create a professional, standardized CV in minutes with our AI-powered builder.
ServicesPage.vaDescription: Get professional virtual assistance for your remote tasks and administrative needs.
ServicesPage.printDescription: Custom menus, flyers, business cards, and promotional materials printed with high quality.
ServicesPage.agreementDescription: Legally binding agreements for car sales, house rentals, and business contracts.
ServicesPage.webDevDescription: Custom high-performance websites, SaaS platforms, and digital solutions for your business.

modern.name: Modern Professional
modern.description: Clean, organized layout perfect for corporate roles.

professional.name: Executive Blue
professional.description: Timeline-based layout with a strong executive sidebar.

classic.name: Timeless Classic
classic.description: Traditional layout that never goes out of style.

golden.name: Golden Executive
golden.description: Premium dark blue and gold design for executives.

elegant.name: Elegant Sidebar
elegant.description: Clean sidebar layout with serif typography.

modern-dark.name: Modern Dark
modern-dark.description: Bold black design with gold accents for creative professionals.

modern-sidebar.name: Modern Sidebar
modern-sidebar.description: Timeline-based design with gray sidebar and ribbon headers.

corporate-focus.name: Corporate Focus
corporate-focus.description: Professional layout with deep blue styling.

minimalist-teal.name: Minimalist Teal
minimalist-teal.description: Clean design with fresh teal accents.

creative-split.name: Creative Split
creative-split.description: Bold indigo layout with unique split header.

emerald-professional.name: Emerald Professional
emerald-professional.description: Fresh and airy design with green accents.

freshman-entry.name: Freshman Entry
freshman-entry.description: Ideal for students and entry-level professionals, highlighting skills and education over work history.

lavender-executive.name: Lavender Executive
lavender-executive.description: Modern, clean design with bold violet accents and a centered professional layout.

TemplateSelectionPage.title: Choose Your CV Template
TemplateSelectionPage.description: Select a template to start building your professional resume. You can change it later.

modern.name: Modern
modern.description: Clean and professional, perfect for tech and creative roles.

classic.name: Classic
classic.description: Timeless and elegant, suitable for corporate and academic positions.

ReviewStep.title: Almost There!
ReviewStep.subtitle: Review your CV preview on the right. Enter your details below to receive your document.
ReviewStep.cardDescription: No account needed. We’ll use this to send your document and track your order.
ReviewStep.noteText: By clicking "Proceed to Payment", you confirm that your CV details are correct.

CheckoutPage.title: Secure Checkout
CheckoutPage.subtitle: Complete your payment to download your professional CV.
CheckoutPage.terms: By clicking pay, you agree to our terms of service.
CheckoutPage.phoneError: Please enter a valid phone number (starting with 09 or 07, 10 digits).

PaymentSuccess.title: Payment Successful!
PaymentSuccess.message: Thank you for your purchase. Your CV is ready for download.

PaymentFailed.title: Payment Failed
PaymentFailed.message: We couldn't process your payment. Please check your balance or network and try again.

PersonalInfo.title: Personal Information
PersonalInfo.description: Start with your basic contact details.
PersonalInfo.photoHint: Recommended: Square JPG or PNG, max 2MB.
PersonalInfo.summaryDescription: Write 2-4 sentences that highlight your value and years of experience.

placeholders.summary: e.g. Experienced software engineer with 5 years of experience...

WebDevelopment.title: Premium Web Development
WebDevelopment.description: We build high-performance, stunning websites tailored to your brand.

steps.typeDesc: Select the type of project you need
steps.detailsDesc: Tell us more about yourself and the project

form.descriptionPlaceholder: Tell us about your vision, features, and timeline...
form.successMessage: We have received your project details. Our team will review it and get back to you shortly.

CoreCompetencies.title: Key Highlights / Core Competencies
CoreCompetencies.description: Add 3-5 key achievements or competencies containing metrics or specific skills.

TemplatesPage.title: Resume Templates
TemplatesPage.description: Land your dream job with captivating CVs you can professionally customize to reflect your true potential.
TemplatesPage.select: Select a template to start building

CoverLetter.title: Cover Letter
CoverLetter.description: Write a persuasive cover letter to accompany your job application.
CoverLetter.toneHelp: Choose the tone that best fits the company culture.
CoverLetter.letterPlaceholder:
Dear Hiring Manager,

I am writing to express my interest in the Software Engineer position at Google...

VirtualAssistance.pageDescription: Submit a request for virtual assistance with your job search
VirtualAssistance.title: Request Virtual Assistance
VirtualAssistance.description: Fill out this form to submit a request for virtual assistance. Please provide accurate information.
VirtualAssistance.additionalNotesPlaceholder: Any additional information you would like to share about your request...
VirtualAssistance.disclaimerText: This request does not guarantee contact, job placement, or response. This platform only collects information for internal review.
VirtualAssistance.disclaimerAccept: I understand and accept the above disclaimer
VirtualAssistance.source: Where did you hear about us?
VirtualAssistance.successMessage: Your request has been received and will be reviewed.
VirtualAssistance.errorMessage: There was an error submitting your request. Please try again.
VirtualAssistance.uploadDescription: Upload your resume (PDF, DOC, DOCX - max 4MB)
VirtualAssistance.uploadError: Failed to upload file. Please try again.

form.title: Order Request
form.notesPlaceholder: Describe your design needs, size, or specific requirements...
form.disclaimer: This is a request only. Final pricing, design confirmation, and payment are handled offline.

success.title: Order Received
success.message: Thank you. Our team will contact you shortly to confirm details.

errors.generic: Something went wrong. Please try again.

va.positioningLine: We apply for jobs on your behalf,professionally, strategically, and consistently.

notes.1: CV writing is a separate service
